15 namespace YAML
16 {
17 template <> struct convert<geometry_msgs::Pose>
18 {
19  static Node encode(const geometry_msgs::Pose& rhs)
20  {
21  Node node;
22  node.push_back(rhs.position.x);
23  node.push_back(rhs.position.y);
24  node.push_back(rhs.position.z);
25  return node;
26  }
27 
28  static bool decode(const Node& node, geometry_msgs::Pose& rhs)
29  {
30  if (!node.IsSequence() || node.size() != 3)
31  {
32  return false;
33  }
34 
35  rhs.position.x = node[0].as<double>();
36  rhs.position.y = node[1].as<double>();
37  rhs.position.z = node[2].as<double>();
38  return true;
39  }
40 };
41 }

46 typedef std::shared_ptr<sensor_msgs::LaserScan> scan_msg_ptr;
47 typedef std::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::Pose> pose_msg_ptr;
48 
49 cv::Point setGridPosition(geometry_msgs::Pose& laser,
50  nav_msgs::MapMetaData& mapInfo)
51 {
52  unsigned int grid_x =
53  (unsigned int)((laser.position.x - mapInfo.origin.position.x) /
54  mapInfo.resolution);
55  unsigned int grid_y =
56  (unsigned int)((-laser.position.y - mapInfo.origin.position.y) /
57  mapInfo.resolution);
58  return cv::Point(grid_x, grid_y);
59 }
60 
61 void getPositionInfo(const std::string& base_frame,
62  const std::string& target_frame,
63  const tf::TransformListener& listener,
64  geometry_msgs::Pose* position, std::vector<double>* rpy)
65 {
66  bool transformReady = false;
67  tf::StampedTransform stf;
68  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tmp;
69  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tmp2;
70  tf::Quaternion q;
71 
72  try
73  {
74  transformReady = listener.waitForTransform(
75  base_frame, target_frame, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(0.01));
76  }
77  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
78  {
79  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
80  }
81 
82  if (transformReady)
83  {
84  try
85  {
86  listener.lookupTransform(base_frame, target_frame, ros::Time(0), stf);
87  }
88  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
89  {
90  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
91  }
92  tmp = tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>(stf, stf.stamp_, base_frame);
93  tf::poseStampedTFToMsg(tmp, tmp2);
94  *position = tmp2.pose;
95 
96  try
97  {
98  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(tmp2.pose.orientation, q);
99  tf::Matrix3x3(q).getRPY((*rpy)[0], (*rpy)[1], (*rpy)[2]);
100  }
101  catch (std::exception ex)
102  {
103  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
104  }
105  }
106 }
107 
108 void configCallback(pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig& config, uint32_t level,
109  rs::RangeSensor* sensor,
110  pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig* dynConfig)
111 {
112  sensor->setConfig(config);
113  *dynConfig = config;
114  ROS_DEBUG("Config was set");
115 }

117 static const double DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE = 30.0;
118 static const std::string DEFAULT_LASER_SCAN_TOPIC = "scan";
119 static const std::string DEFAULT_MAP_LOCATION =
120  ros::package::getPath("pses_simulation") + "/data/map/map.pgm";
121 static const std::string DEFAULT_MAP_METADATA_LOCATION =
122  ros::package::getPath("pses_simulation") + "/data/map/map.yaml";
123 static const std::string DEFAULT_LASERSCAN_FRAME_ID = "scan";
124 static const std::string DEFAULT_MAP_FRAME_ID = "map";
125 
126 void fetchLoopRate(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& loopRate)
127 {
128  if (nh->hasParam("laser_sim/loop_rate_laserscan"))
129  {
130  nh->getParam("laser_sim/loop_rate_laserscan", loopRate);
131  }
132  else
133  {
134  loopRate = DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE;
135  }
136 }
137

139 {
140  if (nh->hasParam("laser_sim/laser_scan_topic"))
141  {

143  }
144  else
145  {
146  laserScanTopic = DEFAULT_LASER_SCAN_TOPIC;
147  }
148 }

188 {
189  if (nh->hasParam("laser_sim/map_frame_id"))
190  {

199 
200 using namespace laserscan;
201 
202 int main(int argc, char** argv)
203 {
204 
205  ros::init(argc, argv, "simulation_laserscan");
206  ros::NodeHandle nh;
207  double loopRate;
208  std::string laserScanTopic, mapLocation, mapMetadataLocation,
209  laserscanFrameID, mapFrameID;
210 
211  fetchLoopRate(&nh, loopRate);
212  fetchLaserScanTopic(&nh, laserScanTopic);
213  fetchMapLocation(&nh, mapLocation);
214  fetchMapMetadataLocation(&nh, mapMetadataLocation);
215  fetchLaserscanFrameID(&nh, laserscanFrameID);
216  fetchMapFrameID(&nh, mapFrameID);
217 
218  // create dynamic reconfigure object
219  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig> server;
220  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig>::CallbackType
221  f;
222  pses_simulation::RangeSensorConfig dynConfig;
223 
224  ros::Publisher scanPub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>(laserScanTopic, 10);
225 
226  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan;
227 
228  // get "god" map meta info
229  nav_msgs::MapMetaData mapInfo;
230  YAML::Node imgMetaInfo = YAML::LoadFile(mapMetadataLocation);
231  double resolution = imgMetaInfo["resolution"].as<double>();
232  geometry_msgs::Pose origin = imgMetaInfo["origin"].as<geometry_msgs::Pose>();
233  mapInfo.origin = origin;
234  mapInfo.resolution = resolution;
235 
236  // get "god" map
237  cv::Mat map = cv::imread(mapLocation, 1);
238  cv::cvtColor(map, map, CV_RGB2GRAY);
239 
240  // create sensor object and link with config object
241  rs::RangeSensor rs_laser(rs::laser);
242  rs_laser.setMap(map);
243  rs_laser.setMapMetaData(mapInfo);
244 
245  f = boost::bind(&configCallback, _1, _2, &rs_laser, &dynConfig);
246  server.setCallback(f);
247 
248  // variables needed for transformations
249  tf::TransformListener listener;
250  geometry_msgs::Pose position;
251  std::vector<double> rpy(3, 0.0);
252  cv::Point gridPose;
253 
254  ros::Time currentTime = ros::Time::now();
255 
256  // Loop starts here:
257  ros::Rate loop_rate(loopRate);
258  while (ros::ok())
259  {
260  currentTime = ros::Time::now();
261  scan.header.stamp = currentTime;
262  scan.header.frame_id = laserscanFrameID;
263  scan.angle_increment = rs::degToRad(dynConfig.laser_angular_resolution);
264  scan.range_min = dynConfig.laser_min_sensor_distance;
265  scan.range_max = dynConfig.laser_max_sensor_distance;
266  scan.angle_min = rs::degToRad(
267  rs::correctYawAngle(0, -dynConfig.laser_field_of_view / 2));
268  scan.angle_max =
269  rs::degToRad(rs::correctYawAngle(0, dynConfig.laser_field_of_view / 2));
270 
271  // get laser range infos
272  getPositionInfo(mapFrameID, laserscanFrameID, listener, &position, &rpy);
273  gridPose = setGridPosition(position, mapInfo);
274  scan.ranges = *rs_laser.getLaserScan(gridPose, rs::radToDeg(rpy[2]));
275 
276  // publish sensor msgs
277  scanPub.publish(scan);
278  ros::spinOnce();
279  loop_rate.sleep();
280  }
281 
282  ros::spin();
283 }
